SummaryEnglish: Ninja Nonsense is an absurdist comedy series which stars Shinobu, a young girl training to become a ninja. However, the series does not focus on ninja training, instead focusing on Shinobu's lifestyle and friends through a series of disjointed comedic plot lines. Towards this purpose, each episode of the anime is split into two separate stories.

1.TitleEnglish: Ninja Trainee Shinobu/The Head Master Appears
1.SummaryEnglish: Ninja trainee Shinobu goes on a mission for her perverted headmaster to collect underwear from high school girls, first targeting Kaede Shiranui.

2.TitleEnglish: Ninjas Elated Over Cherry Blossom Viewing/Shinobu Goes on a Date with Kaede
2.SummaryEnglish: Rainy weather sends the bored ninjas to search for the Loch Ness Monster in their pond; ninja-master Onsokumaru and a masked Sasuke keep a close eye on a girl-girl dating spectacle.

3.TitleEnglish: Onsokumaru Gets Angry/Shinobu Leaves the Manor
3.SummaryEnglish: Onsokumaru gets angry at Shinobu's little sister, Miyabi and decides it's time for a little one-on-one; Shinobu is kicked out of the manor, and heads to Kaede's family.

4.TitleEnglish: Ninjas Hate the Heat/Miyabi in Love
4.SummaryEnglish: Rising temperatures give Onsokumaru a perfect opportunity to get Shinobu and Kaede into their swimsuits; Miyabi has a crush and uses the Ninja Pharmaceutical Group's special love potion to help things along.

5.TitleEnglish: Onsokumaru Goes to Hell/The Ninjas Host a Summer Festival
5.SummaryEnglish: Onsokumaru is sent to Hell and encounters demon schoolgirls, demon wives, and demon in-laws; when it's too hot to train, the ninjas plan a Summer Festival to brighten the mood.

6.TitleEnglish: A Typhoon Arrives/The Ninjas Go Mushroom Picking
6.SummaryEnglish: With Shinobu stuck at Kaede's house as a typhoon looms, those left at the ninja manor witness Onsokumaru's darkest hour; when Onsokumaru offers his wisdom to a mushroom picking expedition, the ninjas are in for a magical ride.

7.SummaryEnglish: Onsokumaru becomes melded to his arch-nemesis Miyabi and the gang try to help detach him; when the men want to play baseball, the girls are told to take their games someplace else.

8.TitleEnglish: Shinobu in Disguise/A Monster Plant Goes Crazy
8.SummaryEnglish: Kaede's school holds a festival, complete with a haunted house; Shinobu gets a new pet, a cute and cuddly five metre tall monster plant.

9.TitleEnglish: The Girls Get Warm/Kaede Gets Sick
9.SummaryEnglish: At a hot spring, Onsokumaru tries to see some skin, but Miyabi's guardians stand in the way; when Kaede gets sick, Shinobu and Onsokumaru take care of her.

10.TitleEnglish: The Ninjas Have Christmas/The Ninjas Are Cursed
10.SummaryEnglish: The ninjas celebrate their first Christmas and Kaede teaches them about the holiday spirit; a bit of year-end cleaning yields a box filled with misfortune, subjecting Kaede, Shinobu, and the rest of the ninjas to one bizarre curse after another.

11.TitleEnglish: The Legend of Sasuke Begins/The Grateful Ninja
11.SummaryEnglish: Sasuke has an adventure filled with full-throttle action; the ninjas put on a play of the Grateful Crane story, but have trouble remembering how it goes.

12.SummaryEnglish: Onsokumaru's secret comes to light, and the shocking truth threatens to change everything for Shinobu; with her goal of becoming a full-fledged ninja in sight, Shinobu just has to pass the dreaded Ninja Graduation Exam.
